SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwHHAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Hireling			    0 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30
; 1 = Retainer			    5 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Oathman			  10 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Lawman			  20 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Kinsman			  30 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = House Cousin	  45 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 31, Agility 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = House Brother	  60 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 32, Agility 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = House Father		  80 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 33, Agility 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Councilman		100 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 34, Agility 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Grandmaster		125 HlaaluReputation,	Speed 35, Agility 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Hlaalu = Marksman, Mercantile, Security, Speechcraft, Blade, LightArmor

SHORT HlaaluAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT HlaaluReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
		
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Hlaalu == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Hlaalu
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0Hlaalu
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Hlaalu)
				SetPCExpelled 0Hlaalu 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from House Hlaalu."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0Hlaalu 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0Hlaalu
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0Hlaalu)
				SetPCExpelled 0Hlaalu 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from House Hlaalu."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0Hlaalu 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF HlaaluAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 40	 ; Qualified to start building Stronghold
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 41
			SetStage fbmwHHStronghold 5
			AddTopic 1stronghold
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 91
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 0
; Continue processing to see if player can advance multiple ranks
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; HlaaluAdvancement == 4

	IF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement >= 41 && GetStage fbmwHHStronghold < 1
		SetStage fbmwHHStronghold 1
		AddTopic 1stronghold
	ENDIF

	IF HlaaluAdvancement == 3 || HlaaluAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 0
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 10 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Security >= 10 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 10
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 1
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 20 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Security >= 20 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 20
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 2
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 30 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Security >= 30 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 30
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 3
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 40 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Security >= 40 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 40
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 4
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 31 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 50 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Security >= 50 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 50
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 5
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 32 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 60 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Security >= 60 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 60
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 6
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 33 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 70 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Security >= 70 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHHStronghold < 100
				IF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement != 69 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 69
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 70
			ENDIF

			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 7
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 34 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 80 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Security >= 80 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 80 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHHStronghold < 200
				IF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement != 79 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 79
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 80
			ENDIF

			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHHAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Hlaalu == 8
		IF HlaaluReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 35 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Marksman >= 90 || Player.GetAV Mercantile >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Security >= 90 || Player.GetAV Speechcraft >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHHAdvancement 90
			SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF

; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET HlaaluAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 3302 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
